body.p: This Interpretation sets out general principles on recognising and measuring the obligations and related rights in service concession arrangements. Requirements for disclosing information about service concession arrangements are in SIC‑29. The issues addressed in this Interpretation are:

li.p: treatment of the operator’s rights over the infrastructure;
recognition and measurement of arrangement consideration;
subsequent accounting treatment of a financial asset and an intangible asset; and
items provided to the operator by the grantor.
